  //forward to hundreads\n                \n            }else if(num/100!=0)// convert hundreads into Roman\n            {\n                counter=num/100;\n                if(counter==9)\n                {\n                    sb.append(\"CM\");\n                    num=num%100; //forward to units\n                }else if(counter==4)\n                {\n                    sb.append(\"XL\");\n                    num=num%10;\n                }else if(counter>=5)\n                {\n                    sb.append(\"L\");\n                    while(counter-5>0)\n                    {\n                        sb.append(\"X\");\n                        counter--;\n                    }\n                    num=num%10;\n                    \n                }else{\n                    while(counter!=0)\n                    {\n                        sb.append(\"X\");\n                        counter--;\n                    }\n                    num=num%10;\n                }\n            }else if(num/1!=0)  // convert units into Roman\n            {\n                counter=num/1;\n                if(counter==9)\n                {\n                    sb.append(\"IX\");\n                    break;      //exit the loop, the process is done\n                }else if(counter==4)\n                {\n                    sb.append(\"IV\");\n                    break;\n                }else if(counter>=5){\n                    sb.append(\"V\");\n                    while(counter-5>0)\n                    {\n                        sb.append(\"I\");\n                        counter--;\n                    }\n                    break;\n                    \n                }else{\n                    while(counter!=0)\n                    {\n                        sb.append(\"I\");\n                        counter--;\n                    }\n                    break;\n                }\n            }\n            \n        }\n        \n        \n        return sb.toString();\n        \n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"integer-to-roman"}
